0: Really enjoyed the gym and Jacuzi

Breakfast had large variety to choose from and was freshly prepared
Our room was comfortable and the staff was super nice
The room was large and clean
the complimentary reception in the afternoon was good
The waterfall in the lobby and the Jacuzi in the poolroom is the icing on the cake
Our hotel was in a perfect area for our concert
1: Then I noticed from grabars in shower we were in an accessible room
BCuz of location and experiences with other Embassy Suites I would try it again AFTER construction
They offered free drinks and snacks from 530 730pm
Managers reception was a nice benefit as well but limited drink choices
I had specifically booked this hotel because of the indoor pool which was prominently displayed on the website
You can tell the renovations are going to look very nice from the sections that are already completed
For all the renos the floors and surrounding areas were kept very clean and the material was contained within the working areas
We were there for 1 night relocation to ATL
Immediately called the front desk from the room ’s phone no answer
2: They even offer free cocktails and snacks for 2 hrs
My girls lips were blue and their skin ice cold after playing for 2 hours
Exercising is important to me and i ’m Considering booking somewhere else for my next trip because I ca n’t exercise in that room
Also an alarm that we did n’t set went off at 6 am
We requested a bathtub but were told by staff at check in that there were no bathtubs in the entire hotel
Took awhile for a room I cam a bit early though but it seem that every other room was ready Except the king that I reserved
I would definitely plan another stay at this property
